item.title: Deluxe Sandwich
item.description: 2 pieces of fresh bread with slices of the finest chicken roasted with awesome oil between them.\n Eat it to experience it!

item.title: Pepperoni Pizza
item.description: An Italian Delight for the palate to enjoy. Feshly baked in a traditional oven, this is something you dont want to miss.

item.title: Chinese Meal
item.description: Rice, Some Balls and Veggies. \n mmm... made in china.
